20110109070105.000|20110109070106.000|CC1|PEOPLE INCLUDING A FEDERAL JUDGE

20110109070614.000|20110109070616.000|CC1|IN CITIES ALL ACROSS THE NATION.
20110109070616.000|20110109070616.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE CALIFORNIA     
20110109070616.000|20110109070619.000|CC1|LAWMAKERS WHO KNOW AND WORK WITH
20110109070619.000|20110109070620.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS SAY THREATS

20110109070622.000|20110109070624.000|CC1|OF TODAY CHANGE HOW THEY DO     
20110109070624.000|20110109070625.000|CC1|THEIR JOB?                      
20110109070625.000|20110109070626.000|CC1|>> I'M NOT WORRIED ABOUT MY     
20110109070626.000|20110109070627.000|CC1|SAFETY.                         
20110109070627.000|20110109070630.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN IN CONGRESS A LONG
